values.value: 1. During the term, and subject to Clientâ€™s compliance with the provisions of the Agreement, Provider authorizes Client to provide the eLearning Courses to Authorized Participants using a secure learning management system (LMS) that Provider provides. 2. Within five business days following the Effective Date set forth above, Provider will provide Client access to a Client-only platform on Provider's LMS. Client admins will have authority to grant Authorized Participants access to training. Each Authorized Participant will have access to training LMS for a period of one year. 3. Client admins will receive usage reports regularly and can request them as needed. Reports will provide detailed user data on progress and completion of eLearning and certifications. 4. Provider will maintain the applicable eLearning Courses for Client, making updates available as they occur, providing tech support to Client admins, and end-user support questions submitted at trainingsupport.linuxfoundation.org. 5. At any point during the subscription year, and as often as needed, Client may add a minimum 20 Authorized Participants per additional order at a cost of $600 USD per Authorized Participant.
